short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help Zdntracker users to manage their ecommerce inventories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is used by zdntracker.com users to facilitate their products and inventories management in different ecommerce platforms.  
It works as website extension reserved for registered user.
